homura.modules.functions package¶

Submodules¶

homura.modules.functions.discretization module¶

homura.modules.functions.discretization.gumbel_softmax(input: torch.Tensor, dim: int, temp: float) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

gumbel softmax

homura.modules.functions.discretization.gumbel_sigmoid(input: torch.Tensor, temp: float) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

gumbel sigmoid function

homura.modules.functions.discretization.straight_through_estimator(input: torch.Tensor) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

straight through estimator

>>> straight_through_estimator(torch.randn(3, 3))
tensor([[0., 1., 0.],
        [0., 1., 1.],
        [0., 0., 1.]])
homura.modules.functions.discretization.semantic_hashing(input: torch.Tensor, is_training: bool) → torch.Tensor[source]¶

Semantic hashing

>>> semantic_hashing(torch.randn(3, 3), True) # by 0.5
tensor([[0.3515, 0.0918, 0.7717],
        [0.8246, 0.1620, 0.0689],
        [1.0000, 0.3575, 0.6598]])

>>> semantic_hashing(torch.randn(3, 3), False)
tensor([[0., 0., 1.],
        [0., 1., 1.],
        [0., 1., 1.]])

homura.modules.functions.miscs.straight_backprop(function)[source]¶
>>> straight_backprop_relu = straight_backprop(F.relu)
>>> straight_backprop_relu(tensor)
Parameters:function – original function
Returns:modified function
